definition: to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Stendhal took a lot of time and care in deciding what the title of his novel would be.
sentences.chinese: 司湯達在確定這部作品的書名時還是頗費了一番周折。

sentences.english: You can read a much more indepth article on stendhal syndrome here.
sentences.chinese: 關於司湯達綜合症，可以點擊此處閱讀更多深入內容。

sentences.english: F. Stendhal is one of the most famous writers of critical realism in the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 司湯達是十九世紀現實主義大師之一。
